title: Punctuation for Writers: An Instructive Reference Text for Writers of Fiction, Essays & Poetry
description: Punctuation for Writers teaches writers how readers will react when they encounter each mark of punctuation. This book empowers writers, enabling them to use punctuation actively and intentionally to create a particular effect in the reader rather than relying on a set of arbitraty rules that change with the situation. Includes a brief grammar.
author: Harvey Stanbrough
